name: Portal Mushrooms Pro
description:
Welcome. This is the Mushroom Portal, with multiple characters! In this strange land, mushrooms are teleported through by pipes by an unknown force. How far can you teleport dem mushrooms? Let's find out!

- No ADS, no IAPs, no crippled gameplay, no data requirements.
- Stupid difficult, but that's why you'll love it.
- Early access sale price. (Try Portal Mushrooms and my other apps. It's free)
- Created by a developer with a heart
- Enjoy
